position_title: Environment Counsel or Professional Staff Member
office: Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
description: Chairwoman Carolyn Maloney (D-NY) seeks to fill an Environment Counsel or Professional Staff Member position on the Democratic staff. The ideal candidate will be an attorney or policy professional with several years of investigative or litigation experience working on environmental issues, or with environmental regulatory agencies.
qualifications: Candidates must have superior attention to detail
Possess excellent written and oral communication skills
Candidates with diverse backgrounds and experiences are strongly encouraged to apply.
how_to_apply: Please send a resume and cover letter to oversightjobs@mail.house.gov, with “Environment” in the subject line.
